 2008-04102008-02-28,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MEMBERS OF THE CANADIAN FORCES AND POLICE OFFICERS) which provides a deduction in computing the taxable income of an eligible member of the Canadian Forces (or police force) who is deployed by the Department of National Defence as a member of certain high-risk international operational missions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0049 Publication Date: 2008-03-19
